00044 #include "RayTraceDialog.h"
00045 
00046 #include <QFileDialog>
00047 #include <QDir>
00048 RayTraceDialog::RayTraceDialog( QWidget * parent, Qt::WindowFlags f )
00049 :QDialog ( parent, f )
00050 {
00051         setupUi( this );
00052         connect( this, SIGNAL( accepted() ), this, SLOT( saveChanges() ) );
00053 }
00054 
00055 RayTraceDialog::RayTraceDialog( int numRays, double fraction, bool drawPhotons, bool increasePhotonMap, QString resultsFile, QWidget * parent, Qt::WindowFlags f )
00056 :QDialog ( parent, f ), m_numRays( numRays ), m_fraction( fraction ), m_drawPhotons( drawPhotons ), m_increasePhotonMap( increasePhotonMap ), m_resultsFile( resultsFile )
00057 {
00058         setupUi( this );
00059         raysSpinBox->setValue( m_numRays );
00060         drawSpinBox->setValue( m_fraction );
00061         photonsCheckBox->setChecked( m_drawPhotons );
00062         
00063         if ( m_increasePhotonMap )
00064                 increaseMapRadioButton->setChecked( true );
00065         else
00066                 newMapRadioButton->setChecked( true );
00067                 
00068         resultsFileLineEdit->setText( m_resultsFile );
00069         connect( this, SIGNAL( accepted() ), this, SLOT( saveChanges() ) );
00070 }
00071 
00072 RayTraceDialog::~RayTraceDialog()
00073 {
00074         
00075 }
00076 
00077 void RayTraceDialog::on_applyPushButton_clicked( bool checked )
00078 {
00079 
00080         m_numRays = raysSpinBox->value();
00081         
00082         m_fraction = drawSpinBox->value();
00083         m_drawPhotons = photonsCheckBox->isChecked();
00084         
00085         if( newMapRadioButton->isChecked() ) 
00086                 m_increasePhotonMap = false;
00087         else
00088                 m_increasePhotonMap = true;
00089         m_resultsFile = resultsFileLineEdit->text();
00090         
00091         
00092         
00093 }
00094 
00095 void RayTraceDialog::on_fileDialogButton_clicked( bool checked )
00096 {
00097         QString oldFile = resultsFileLineEdit->text();
00098         QString fileName = QFileDialog::getSaveFileName( this,
00099                                tr( "Save results document" ), "results",
00100                                tr( "*.dat" ) );
00101         
00102         if (fileName.isNull() ) resultsFileLineEdit->setText( oldFile );
00103         else resultsFileLineEdit->setText( fileName );
00104         
00105         
00106 }
00107 
00108 void RayTraceDialog::saveChanges()
00109 {
00110         m_numRays = raysSpinBox->value();
00111         
00112         m_fraction = drawSpinBox->value();
00113         m_drawPhotons = photonsCheckBox->isChecked();
00114         
00115         if( newMapRadioButton->isChecked() ) 
00116                 m_increasePhotonMap = false;
00117         else
00118                 m_increasePhotonMap = true;
00119                 
00120         m_resultsFile = resultsFileLineEdit->text();
00121 
00122         
00123 }
